mapper.insert: insert into workExp (uid, name, type, ocp, dep, opcDate, text) values (#{uid}, #{name}, #{type}, #{ocp}, #{dep}, #{opcDate}, #{text})
mapper.update: UPDATE workExp SET workExp.name = #{name}, workExp.type = #{type}, workExp.ocp = #{ocp}, workExp.dep = #{dep}, workExp.opcDate = #{opcDate}, workExp.text = #{text} WHERE workExp.id = #{id};
